message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose a fair split. This is better than you'll get if we wait too long.
I'll meet you halfway between my first offer and your counteroffer
This is a reasonable offer, Alice. Let's settle this before inflation eats away at the value further.
I'll compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Alice, let's be realistic. This is a generous offer considering the inflation. Take it before it shrinks even more.
